tierOne.name: Secret SCP
tierOne.description: You are anomalies (write down what makes you anomalis somewhere secret). If discover you can use your SCP power to avoid capture

tierOne.name: Blend In
tierOne.description: You can fade into the background if nobody is interacting with you directly

tierTwo.name: converse with the public
tierTwo.description: It is 1 degree easier to interact with the general public

tierThree.name: moves through crowd
tierThree.description: when in a large group/crowd you can move 1 degree easier

tierFour.name: oblivious of the horror
tierFour.description: You didn't even notice that blood ozing from the wall or the wispers from that flesh bound book

tierFive.name: SCP under cover
tierFive.description: Your SCP nature allows to use your SCP powers on the DL

tierSix.name: Surviving in secret
tierSix.description: If you survived this long without being discover you can use any and all SCP
